name: Vegan Roasted Curry Cauliflower
author: Paige
summary: Delicious way to eat roasted cauliflower. I prefer to use all organic ingredients. Enjoy hot as a side dish or atop rice bowls or soups.
ingredients: 4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Remove tough core and break (or cut) the florets into bit sized pieces
Combine olive oil, lemon juice, curry powder, salt, cayenne, and garam masala in a large bowl; mix into a paste
Add cauliflower and gently mix with a spoon to evenly coat with the spice paste
Transfer cauliflower to the prepared baking sheet and spread out in one layer
Roast in the preheated oven until cauliflower begins to caramelize, 20 to 25 minutes
